content.rendered:
Why Us?

We offer more than
just the best rates.

Free Quote
Contact Sales

Best Merchant Services Processing
Company In Los Angeles.

Our banking and technology partners

In addition to industry-leading rates, we provide so much more. From 24/7 customer support with a real person, to the latest POS systems available and custom marketing solutions, we want to partner with you to grow your business.

Low Rates, Guaranteed

Not only will we offer you the best possible rate, we guarantee it will never go up

Get Your Custom Rate

24/7 live support.

Get unlimited support, 24/7. No matter when you call, you’ll be connected to a real person who can solve your billing and tech issues.

Process payments like a pro.

Get access to world-class marketing solutions.

At a discount

from branding and PPC advertising to social media management and a mobile ordering app, we can ensure your business reaches your customers.

What Our Clients Say
About Dynamic Merchant Solutions.

We can’t wait to work with you to grow your business

Maria Mak

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Mikaela Stone

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

Chris Mathew

Founder - The Mart Group

The Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers a good rewards rate for cardholders who spend a heavy amount on food, but most cardholders are probably better off searching for a.

The best merchant services company
for small businesses.

Free Quote
Contact Sales
No application or setup fees  | No hidden fees  |  24/7 customer service
